title: Dunkmaster Darius Problem
body: The skin is nice, I love it. However, when DM {{champion:122}} lands a crit, his old AA sound plays (the one that sounds like a blade). It's awkward to have a basketball net play a blade sound, so i bet this was a mistake, and rito forgot to change it. RITO PLS NOTICE ME AND FIX IT

replies.body:
Thanks for the report! You're right, it's not playing the right crit! We'll get it fixed!

***GET DUNKED!***
Need Dunk Master Pantheon with his Space Slams
DUNK MASTER ZAC I TELL YOU. IT NEEDS TO HAPPEN.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=EWFMOJN8,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-01-16T18:57:12.729+0000)
>
> Thanks for the report! You're right, it's not playing the right crit! We'll get the fixed!
> 
> ***GET DUNKED!***

Please make it sound like a ***SWISH!*** (When the ball and the net cradle each other in their embrace)
pls do this and i love you lung time.



Example:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=L8yM-PAtwFQ

> [{quoted}](name=Megarolf,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=EWFMOJN8,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2015-01-17T00:44:39.274+0000)
>
> Please make it sound like a ***SWISH!*** (When the ball and the net cradle each other in their embrace)
> pls do this and i love you lung time.
> 
> 
> 
> Example:
> https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=L8yM-PAtwFQ

There's actually already a sound for it, it was just hooked up improperly, causing it not to play!

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=EWFMOJN8,comment-id=000000010000,timestamp=2015-01-17T00:52:04.148+0000)
>
> There's actually already a sound for it, it was just hooked up improperly, causing it not to play!

kk
who on earth downvotes a legitimate bug report?
I have an issue with Dunkmaster Darius too, 4/5 people who play against me in that skin rage and insult all game long.
Basketball boards are sharp doe. cut my hand on it the other day.
Dunkmaster Darius crits you so hard, he makes the basketball goal hit like a blade.
